joins.joinExpression: is_clinical_encounter=1 and timestampdiff(day,if(t1.rtc_date,t1.rtc_date,DATE_ADD(t1.encounter_datetime,INTERVAL 30 DAY)),t2.endDate) <= 90 and encounter_datetime <= t2.endDate and coalesce(death_date, out_of_care) is null and (t1.next_clinical_datetime_hiv is null or t1.next_clinical_datetime_hiv > t2.endDate)

filters.expression: Timestampdiff(month, arv_start_date, encounter_datetime) >= 6 AND timestampdiff(day, date(vl_1_date), date(?)) <= 365 AND (Coalesce(t1.death_date, out_of_care) IS NULL )
timestampdiff(month, arv_start_date, encounter_datetime) >= 6 and timestampdiff(day, date(vl_1_date), date(t2.endDate)) <= 365
Timestampdiff(month, arv_start_date, encounter_datetime) >= 6 AND Timestampdiff(day, vl_1_date, encounter_datetime) <365 AND vl_1 < 1000
Timestampdiff(month, arv_start_date, encounter_datetime) >= 6 AND Timestampdiff(day, vl_1_date, encounter_datetime) <365 AND vl_1 < 1000
timestampdiff(month, arv_start_date, encounter_datetime) >= 6 and (timestampdiff(day, date(vl_1_date), date(?)) > 365 or vl_1_date is null)
timestampdiff(month, arv_start_date, encounter_datetime) >= 6 and (orders.date_created is null or orders.concept_id!=856)
timestampdiff(month, arv_start_date, encounter_datetime) >= 6 and (timestampdiff(day, date(vl_1_date), date(?)) > 365 or vl_1_date is null) and (orders.date_created is null or orders.concept_id!=856)
timestampdiff(month,arv_start_date,encounter_datetime) >= 6 and timestampdiff(day, date(vl_1_date), date(?)) <= 365 and vl_1 >= 1000
orders.concept_id=856  and date(vl_1_date) != date(orders.date_created) and  date(vl_1_date) < date(?)
